titre: A digital solution tailored to your needs.
texte: Every project is unique: whether it's creating a website, optimizing your online presence, or developing a custom tool, I support you at every step to turn your ideas into concrete and effective solutions.

Find our Breton cuisine in Mendoza, Argentina, from October to the end of December 2025, then again from March to May 2026.
And for a summer full of indulgence, we'll be in Punta del Este, Uruguay, from late December 2025 to late February 2026.
Find us soon on Instagram to follow our adventure!
Choose the formula that suits your needs.

Crêpes – a true icon of Breton gastronomy, the crêpe comes in sweet or plain versions, with its thin, delicate batter made from soft wheat. Garnished to your taste — Nutella, fresh strawberries, dulce de leche, or homemade salted butter caramel — it promises a moment of sweetness, between tradition and pleasure.

Galettes – an iconic savory specialty from Brittany, the galette is made from buckwheat flour, giving it a rustic texture and authentic taste. Generously filled with egg, ham, and melted cheese, it can be enjoyed at any time for a Breton escape full of character.

Quiche Lorraine – originating from the Lorraine region in France, this classic recipe of French cuisine combines a tender shortcrust pastry with a creamy filling of fresh cream, eggs, and smoked bacon. Best enjoyed hot or warm, served with a crisp salad for a simple, tasty, and elegant break.
Find us soon on Instagram to follow our adventure!

After several years in the kitchen — a world where rigor, creativity, and adaptability are essential — I chose to turn to my true passion: web development and programming. This experience taught me to take on challenges, work as part of a team, and pay attention to detail — qualities I now bring to your digital projects.

Digital can seem complex, but with clear and pedagogical guidance, it becomes a real opportunity. My approach: tailor-made solutions, consistent with your needs, designed with an eco-friendly mindset.
Beyond web development, I also master 3D modeling and video editing. These skills can complement your existing projects or become standalone projects, depending on your needs.
